blogs.title: Cupcakes & Cashmere
blogs.description: A lifestyle fashion blog, full of all sorts of great posts on everything from fashion/beauty to decor.
blogs.author: Emily Schuman
comments: Her beauty tutorials are also always fascinating and spot-on.

blogs.title: Advice from a Twenty Something
blogs.description: A lifestyle blog, full of “advice for the modern girl” on everything from fashion to beauty.
blogs.author: Amanda Holstein
comments: She shares all sorts of helpful tutorials on all things stylish.
